snippet: The daughter of Oswaldo Payá, a critic of the Castro government, is calling for an independent investigation into the car wreck that killed him in July.
abstract: Rosa Maria Paya, daughter of Cuban dissident Oswaldo Paya, who died in car wreck in 2013, calls for independent investigation into incident after driver Angel Carromero Barrios says he was struck by another car from behind just before accident; allegation by Barrios reverses his previous claim that crash was accident, statement he says was given under pressure by Cuban authorities.
lead_paragraph: The daughter of Oswaldo Payá, a critic of the Castro government, is calling for an independent investigation into the car wreck that killed him in July.

headline.seo: Inquiry Is Sought Into Death of Oswaldo Payá, Cuban Dissident
headline.main: Inquiry Is Sought Into Death of Castro Critic
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Is Sought Into Death of Castro Critic

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
